name: Split Slimes
description:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Let the Slimes Reunite!

This is a game about slimes, but they're pretty stupid. They have only learned to do one thing. Can you reunite them?

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Download the final version, if that doesn't work, download the other one.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Press W to jump with the Orange Slime (Neutral Eyes)

Press A to walk to the left with the Dark Blue Slime (Bored Eyes)

Press D to walk to the right with the Light Blue Slime (Scared Eyes)

Point and Press S to shoot a bullet with the  Pink Slime (Happy Eyes)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

How to play:

Reunite the Slimes! If every Slime touches one another, then you win! 

Slimes get stuck to each other when they touch, they'll also get the other's ability!

For example, If the Orange and Dark Blue Slime meet, you now have a Slime that can jump, walk left and jump diagonally to the left!

Beware of the Mushrooms! If you get shot your poor Slime dies!

Hint/Tip: Some platforms are moveable!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was made for the Game Makers ToolKit 2021 Game Jam.

Made by Kaz, Calvin, Mike and Mendel
